title: Pixel 5 goes into fastboot mode every time it's rebooted. How can I avoid this?
content: I'm trying to have a normal restart or reboot, rather than have the "Fastboot" screen come up each time. I can eventually get out of it by holding down the Power button and the Volume Down button while fastboot has "Start" selected. But this is really annoying. I don't want to see fastboot come up at all when I do a Restart.  What's going on here?  Thanks!
